Yaa I fixed :D
If you have a Dual Core AMD processer, just turn one off for Painkiller

this is how I fixed the problem:
after starting, Windows key[or Alt-Tab] out [but don't close] goto Windows Task Manager [Ctrl-Alt-Del], to the Processes tab, find "Painkiller.exe" right-click. Goto "Set Affinity..." and uncheck either CPU 0 or CPU 1 [ just one of them ] then go back in and it should be fine, it was for me.

digituch, it's normal for downloaded games. When you buy a game you get an unique serial. But you can only play with 1 serial online. So if you buy the game you get an unique serial you can play online with but if you download a game more then thousand people have that serial and you must be very lucky if you can play online then! :P

@ those having problems with that direct x error, you probably have a graphic card that dont have a TnL support, get a little prog called "3d Analyze" and tick "emulate HW TnL caps". Worked for me as well as the game did as well as all dopeman releases :)
